rule: The chatbot may vary in classification consistency depending on variations in input text length, style, or complexity.
validityText:
The input provided ("World news: Short article.") is insufficient as it does not constitute a complete news article. The input specification explicitly requires the input to be a string containing the text of a **complete** news article suitable for classification. The given input appears to be merely a headline or a title, lacking the necessary content and structure of a full news article.

ERR
